name: Prologue: Guilt
description:
BEFORE YOU PLAY:
  • Mouse is highly recommended.  (Scroll down for full list of controls.)
  • If playing with trackpad and/or without dedicated graphics card, please do not activate full-screen mode. (If you are unsure if you have a dedicated graphics card or not, you most likely do not.)
  • Once the game finishes loading, click again to begin (your cursor should disappear). Start with moving your mouse/trackpad gently to look around, then walk forward into the title.
  • Walk close to an object before interacting with it, by clicking or tapping. The navigator is quite sensitive, so give yourself a few minutes to feel the navigation if you are new to gaming platforms.
Controls:
  • Mouse = Look Around
  • Mouse Left Click or E = Interact
  • W = Walk Forward (In the direction you are looking)
  • S = Walk Backward
  • A  = Step Left
  • D = Step Right
  • Mouse Right Click (Two-Finger Click on Mac Trackpads) = Zoom
  • ESC = Release cursor from game (get your mouse cursor back to do normal computer things). Click on game again to get back in (mouse cursor should disappear).
Browser Support:
  • Google Chrome
  • Firefox
  • Microsoft Edge (New)
    • Browser Icon is Green *and* Blue, not just a Blue E
